newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Newspapers urge respect for cultural diversity.
newsitem.headline: Newspapers urge respect for cultural diversity.

text.p: The European Union's newspaper owners on Tuesday welcomed the Commission's move to simplify the regulatory environment for advertisers, but urged it not to damage the EU's cultural diversity.

"The newspaper publishers support the Commission's effort to simplify the regulatory environment in Europe. This is a necessary step as Europe prepares for the information society," the European Newspaper Publishers' Association said in a statement.
"Harmomisation and simplification should not be done at the expense of cultural identities and social values that are the fabric of the European model, it said.
